title: Game Of Thrones Theme Tune
lyrics:
Split in two groups: 
1st group (Bass) sings: “da da, da, da, da, da da…” 
2nd group (Melody): “Daaaaa, da, da da daaaa, da, da, da, daa”
 
[strumming: 4 bars each - increase intensity each time] x4
(Em)Da da da….. (B)da da... (D)Da da da….. (Am)da da...
 
[finale]
(C)Daaa…. (G)Daaaa…. (Am)Daaaa... (Em)Daaaa...
 
(Em)Da da da….. (B)da da... (D)Da da da….. (Am)da da...
[singing and strumming x3 beats then END]
